DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aims to assess a new device designed for an objective measure of sleep parameters. The purpose of the device is to assess, in a more simple and precise way, the impact of deep brain stimulation on patient's sleep.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of Continuous Sleep Recording in Patients Undergoing Deep Brain Stimulation for Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: patient > 18 years old with Parkinson disease scheduled for implantation of electrodes for deep brain stimulation Exclusion criteria: pregnant or breast feeding patient refusal to participate in the study patient under legal protection no health insurance coverage
